OCD.name: Flickr Reader
OCD.description: This algorithm retireve the Flickr's image URLs for the given Flickr User IDs

AD.name: Flickr API key
AD.description: Please provide your Flickr API key

AD.name: Flickr User ID
AD.description: Please provide the column that contains the Flickr user IDs

AD.name: Tag
AD.description: Leave it empty if you want to download all images. Else, provide the tag to be searched.
